metadata.title: Moceen Boy's Girl's Classic Lace-Up Oxford Shoes Comfort School Uniform Dress Loafer Flats (Toddler/Little Kid)
features: [CLASSIC] - Classic & Simple Design, Suit for Both Casual and Formal wear, makes this a perfect shoe for school uniforms or basic casual wear
[COMFORTABLE] - Made of durable synthetic Leather upper & lightly padded insole, this saddle oxford shoes are super comfortable for kids everyday wearing.
[SOFT NONSLIP] - Thick soft non-slip manmade outsole, better control of movement and avoid injuries, Safe for toddler little kids!
[LACE UP CLOSURE] - Laces for a snug fit, also allows tiny toes room to breathe and splay naturally during walking, enhancing balance and reducing rubbing, friction, and moisture.
[Arch Support] â€“ Shoe last and insole designed to provide proper arch support for developing feet.
description: Moceen Boy's Girl's Classic Lace-Up Oxford Shoes Comfort School Uniform Dress Loafer Flats (Toddler/Little Kid) Style: Boys Girls Lace Up Oxford Shoes Material: Synthetic Leather Sole: Manmade Pattern: Solid with Perforation Details Shoe Width: Medium Closure Type: Lace Up Gender: Unisex Child Item Includes: 1 Pair of Kids Boy/Girl Oxfords Occasion: School,Casual,Dress,Holiday,Daily,Wedding...

Your little love will look very stylish with a pair of this Moceen kids classic oxfords. It features a durable faux leather upper with perforation details and laces for a snug fit, lightly padded insole for comfort, and a flexible non-skid outsole.Very comfortable and stylish! These toddler oxfords can be used as school uniform shoes, party shoes, photo shoes, dress shoes, even daily wear. Perfect for all formal and informal occasions!
